mapper.sql: uid, uname, upassword, joint_id, unick, utel, uverification, ustatus, utype, uparent_id, create_time, update_by, update_time, last_login_time, last_login_ip, uavatar, uregion_id, uprovince_id, uregion_path, uaddress, ubirthday, ugenter, membership_id, supplier_type

SELECT u.uid, u.uname,u.upassword,r.id as ROLE_ID, r.name as ROLE_NAME, m.id as MENU_ID, m.action_name as PERMISSION_NAME FROM td_user as u, td_role as r, td_menu as m, td_role_permission as pr, td_user_role as ru WHERE u.uid = ru.uid AND r.id = ru.rid AND m.id = pr.pid AND r.id = pr.rid

update td_user
uname = #{uname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
upassword = #{upassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
joint_id = #{jointId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
unick = #{unick,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
utel = #{utel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
uverification = #{uverification,jdbcType=TINYINT},
ustatus = #{ustatus,jdbcType=TINYINT},
utype = #{utype,jdbcType=TINYINT},
uparent_id = #{uparentId,jdbcType=INTEGER},

supplier_type = #{supplierType,jdbcType=TINYINT},
where uid = #{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
